articles.title: China, Russia undermine international Myanmar response, EU's top diplomat says - CNA
articles.description: BRUSSELS: The European Union's top diplomat said on Sunday (Apr 11) that Russia and China were hampering a united international response to Myanmar's military coup and that the EU could offer more economic incentives if democracy returns to the country.
